replies.body:
Nice way to put the post.

Not making any clear arguments, showing numbers or otherwise SHOWING why it was a unneeded nerf. Or why he should really be buffed. (personally i say drop his move speed a little and he would be fine with his old numbers)  

But yep i'm sure riot will respond to this.
he falls off so hard late game. what more do i need to say. and i quote from what they said "he's been dominating the last two weeks". what more need i say.

Okay since you need examples...

Pantheon currently has a very strong early game this is true.

This is because.
-He has the highest base MS in the game, Making it easier to gank/Trade in lane.
-Being a AD caster means he's not reliant on lots of attack speed.
-E passive makes it easier to clean up kills+last hit. 
-Point and click stun
-High poke 
-High early game pressure at 6.
-Block can stop a tower shot, which is a life saver in dives.

Pantheon does have very clear weaknesses though.
-Very mana hungry. 4-5 Q's and he's running on empty.
-Thought item changes to AD made him better, There are even better choices like Yi, Xin, Udyr who got even better buffs with the {{item:3124}} changes. which has pretty much pushed him out of the jungle.
-Recent nerf to Thunderlords hit his damage already.
-Falls of late (because current junglers outclass him, As do most tops once they get some items)


You get the idea? Point out key weaknesses, Reasons for his power. (honestly this is all i can think of.)

How about some actual reasoning? Due to the the new items, he got heavily buffed this season, but was flying under the radar for a while. Because games tend to be more snowball-y, he was in a position where he often *didn't* fall off, because the game ended before it got to that point. His skills are point an click, so there was no way of counterplaying getting jump stunned, and then 100-0'ed due to crits with the armor pen he built.

And even then, sometimes lane bullies need to be toned down -- Renekton is a famous example of this.

Yes he did. AD itemization is much better now, Armor Penetration is easy to buy. Duskblade is an amazing item on him. Thunderlord's Decree is a great on him. The overall game time got shorter, so his power spike lasts for more of the game.

So yes, he got indirectly buffed.
Yes because of keystones and item changes he got indirect buffs.

Pantheon's E didn't deserve to lose that much damage, especially for a shitty channel that only works if you're fed. Base and scaling ensure it's shit at almost every stage now.

The R nerfs would've been sufficient with his map pressure, and perhaps a light tap on his Q (seeing you can't dodge that and it's oppressive as fuck). Trashing his E was a poor decision.
Agreed, I would say it's hardly worth putting points into anymore. Seems like autos would do more.
Late game doesn't matter if you snowball so hard that it ends in 20 minutes.
